alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo County through 245 PM MST... At 222 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Aripine, or 22 miles northeast of Forest Lakes, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dry Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
